metadata.title: CVE-2018-18826 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: There exists a heap-based buffer overflow in vc1_decode_p_mb_intfi invc1_block.c in Libav 12.3, which allows attackers to cause adenial-of-service via a crafted aac file.

criterions.comment: qtwebengine-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
vlc package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
gst-libav1.0 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
